name: Super Simple Crypto - Offline Crypto Miner
name_original: Super Simple Crypto - Offline Crypto Miner
description:
Each time a ball bounces off your trail, you get +1SSC.

With every ball you obtain, your account is worth 0.10$ more.

- if a ball touches your unfinished trail, it destroys all of your trails

Enter - Buy New Ball ( 100.000SSC's )

W, A, S, D - Movement

Space - Draw Trail

R - Delete Trail

Esc - Exit

- when you save your project, the program will create a file next to itself named ''SSC_Profile'' that will be necessary to load your progress later on

( Keep in mind that your program and a save file need to be in the same space/folder for normal functionality of a system. )

To get your first free 100.000SSC's, you have to create a new profile.

To do that, simply using a left and right mouse button, leave your sign at the bottom right corner and save the game. After that is done, click on ''Signed!'' at any time either by holding a left or right mouse button to uncover your sign. Then you should receive your starting SSC's!

- you can uncover and take a look at your sign at any time but can never edit it again

- the only thing is, to sell your account, you yourself need to find a buyer of your profile

-N.N
